income_messages:
From: h*************9@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 06:05:38
SUBJECT:   Dear: Sir/Ms,
  Dear: Sir/Ms,
I am a managing director in the Nigerian Federal Ministry Of Petroleum
and Natural resources where foreign oil contracts are awarded and
executed.
Recently and as directed by the presidency,The Nigerian National
Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) and other Federal Government of Nigeria
Parastatal/Agencies released some names of foreign
beneficiary's/Creditors whose foreign contract payments have been
delayed for years, more than a decade.
There is a foreign beneficiary/contractor whose name showed up on the
list was the Name of a late foreign contractor to the Nigerian
National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC). Therefore, I would like you and
me to have a conversation concerning the late client's entitlement and
to present you as the Next of Kin. The payment of the fund will be
processed in your name and the fund released to you legally.
More on this issue shall be discussed with you when you show interest
and willingness to this email message. Please, my personal email is:
harrisonbello19@gmail.com
Best Regard,
Mr. Harrison Bello   
From: h*************9@gmail.com
To: fy07293@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 10:06:34
SUBJECT: Your Mail
Hello Sir,
Thanks for your email which indicated your interest. You can help in
this transaction by working with me and following my instruction till
the end and we meet ourselves in your country as soon as you confirm
the receipt of the fund to me.
Therefore, as stated in my mail, you are going to be the next of kin
to the late client and all relevant legal papers will be in your name
or company's name and address and when finally obtained will be
forwarded to you for your perusal and record purposes and the payment
of the fund shall be from the federal government Probate office via
the payment bank.
Therefore, What i need from you to commence this transaction legally
is your full name or company's name and address and your direct phone
lines. Once i receive it from you, i shall use them to apply and
obtain all legal papers covering you as the next of kin to the late
client and when completed all copies will be sent to you and the other
copies shall be sent to the payment ministry in the Presidency who
shall contact you for the legal release of the fund to you.
I am looking forward to work with you and meet you face to face in
your country after the release of the fund to you. Please, note that
there no risk is involved in this transaction and the payment modality
shall go through the legal Channel and you are required to keep
everything strictly to yourself only.
Waiting to hear from you asap today.
My Regards,
Mr.Harrison Bello
From: h*************9@gmail.com
To: fy07293@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 15:21:23
SUBJECT: Your Mail
Thanks for your mail.
if you have my previous mail yesterday i did inform you that there is
no risk involve now and after the transaction but you must keep this
transaction very confidential because of the nature. My plan is to
invest the fund in your country that is my own share of the fund
probably in your area of specialization as you may advise.
If you are now ready to work with me and receive the fund, forward
your details and i will use it to apply legally and obtain the papers
covering your name and address as the next of kin.
Regards,
Harrison Bello
From: h*************9@gmail.com
To: fy07293@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-17 10:41:26
SUBJECT: Your Mail
You have asked me this question and i have answered you so check your
mail both inbox and spam.
Regards,
Harrison Bello
From: h*************9@gmail.com
To: fy07293@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-17 13:07:48
SUBJECT: Your Mail
Why are you repeating things and your mail. you have sent it before
and i have responded as well and i know you have received it
before.Now i repeat again, there is no risk attached in this
transaction and the fund when received by you i will use my share for
investment in your country.i hope it is clear.
Regards.
Harrison Bello
outbound_messages:
From: fy07293@m**************m
To: h*************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-14 06:05:38
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear: Sir/Ms,
I am really keen to cooperate with you. But is there any potential risks that could effect your company and me?
From: fy07293@m**************m
To: h*************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-15 10:13:30
SUBJECT: Re: Your Mail
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
From: fy07293@m**************m
To: h*************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-15 16:04:14
SUBJECT: Re: Your Mail
I am happy to collaborate with you, but I want to know more about your plan and potential risks of course.

SUBJECT: Re: Your Mail
I am happy to collaborate with you, but I want to know more about your plan and potential risks of course.
